    SQL
    SQL.setDescending(boolean isDescending)
    Sets the value of the ~%sortOrder% variable to "DESC" if the argument equals true and to "ASC" if the argument equals false.
    SQL
    SQL.setOrderBy(Object sortColumn, boolean isDescending)
    Sets the values of the values of the ~%sortColumn% and ~%sortOrder% variables.
    SQL
    SQL.setOrderBy(Object sortColumn, Object sortOrder)
    Sets the values of the values of the ~%sortColumn% and ~%sortOrder% variables.
    SQL
    SQL.setSortColumn(Object sortColumn)
    If you decide to go along and parametrize the sort column using a variable named ~%sortColumn%, this method lets you set the value for that variable.
    SQL
    SQL.setSortOrder(Object sortOrder)
    If you decide to go along and parametrize the sort order using a variable named ~%sortOrder%, this method lets you set the value for that variable.
